channel.title: 2 things help me :D
channel.description: 1. How do i make it so they only get 1 starter kit i try importing another one by deleting the one i had but then i got errors need a new 1 please. 2.How do i edit the colour of lvls ?

item.title: 2 things help me :D
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

add this to your commands

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && starterKit == 0) { addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); sendMessage("You recieved this dumb gift"); starterKit = 1; } else if(starterKit == 1) { sendMessage("LOL N33B"); playerHandler.messageToAll = "Report"+playerName+"for item duping!"; }

then find

if (token.equals("character-height")) { heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2);

underneath it add

if (token.equals("character-starterKit")) { starterKit = Integer.parseInt(token2);

then find

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-height = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(heightLevel), 0, Integer.toString(heightLevel).length());

underneath it add

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-starterKit = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starterKit), 0, Integer.toString(starterKit).length());

then find

heightLevel = 0;

underneath it add

starterKit = 0;

100% me made myself

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things help me :D
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

try put this into ur java.client

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 700000000); sendMessage("The starter packet for KILLARSCAPE players !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }
